sentences.en: A few sessions talking to a counsellor should straighten him out.
sentences.cn: 跟辅道员谈几次就会使他改正过来的.
你是不是在看心理辅导员？

sentences.en: Children who have suffered like this should see a counsellor experienced in bereavement.
sentences.cn: 经受了这种苦难的孩子应该去咨询在排遣丧亲之痛方面有着丰富经验的辅导人员。

sentences.en: Counsellor is that wise old man.
sentences.cn: 军师是那个聪明的老头.

sentences.en: Each counsellor undergoes an intensive training programme before beginning work.
sentences.cn: 每个辅导员在上岗前都要接受密集培训。

sentences.en: He helped them with their problems and he became a counsellor to many of the men.
sentences.cn: 他帮助他们解决问题,成了许多人的贴心人.

sentences.en: He talked to a counsellor about his marriage difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他和辅导员谈了他的婚姻窘况.

sentences.en: His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.
sentences.cn: 他姐姐过去一直指导他, 给他出主意,是他的朋友.

sentences.en: His visit to a counsellor really helped him get thingsoff his chest.
sentences.cn: 与咨询员的谈话让他将心事一吐为快.

sentences.en: If you are uncomfortable with your counsellor or therapist, you must discuss it.
sentences.cn: 如果面对咨询顾问或治疗师时你觉得不自在，一定要提出来。

sentences.en: If your marriage or relationship is in disrepair, enlist the help of a marriage guidance counsellor.
sentences.cn: 如果你们的婚姻或关系出现裂痕，就向婚姻指导顾问求助。

sentences.en: The counsellor referred her to another therapist.
sentences.cn: 咨询指导让她去看另一位治疗专家。

sentences.en: They sought the help of a marriage counsellor.
sentences.cn: 他们寻求婚姻顾问的帮助。

sentences.en: Training as a marriage counsellor would guarantee her some employment once her schooling was through.
sentences.cn: 她接受的婚姻指导师培训能保证她学业一结束就找到工作。

sentences.en: You need to take your problems to a trained counsellor.
sentences.cn: 你需要去找训练有素的咨询顾问请教这些问题。
